title: "If Yasuo doesnt win lane he's trash" Syndrome is the most toxic thing in the game.
body:
Hello I am a Yasuo fan. I am not a main, but hes a fun champion so i play him every once in a while.

I get into a game and it turns out im laning against a Diamond Aatrox main... I got shit on to be frank, however came out of lane with a not IMMENSLY terrible score all things considered. I mean its whatever it happens. I wasnt very surprised. However there were some members of my team who proceeded to constantly troll and be toxic to me for being "trash"

I mean i already knew they were toxic since they were also trolling my jungler.

But the "If Yasuo doesnt win lane he is trash" syndrome is honestly one of the most toxic and infuriating attitudes in the game and it makes me wish Riot was harsher against people who exhibit extremely toxic behavior all game even if its in a single game. Like a 1 day ban or something.

replies.body: Was this in ranked? or norms?
Norms, i dont play Yas in ranked. I am kind enough to not put my team through that.

Falls along with riven and draven too, it's unfortunate... Already have a negative atmosphere just from picking the champion

Sorry for your game
I feel you. its the same for us riven mains.

The funny thing is Yas is one of those champions that can completely lose lane, and just furiously farm everything in sight for 10 minutes, and come back to q spam everything dead. 

That's one of the reasons why Yas is so hated as a champion.
My brain is telling me to feel sorry that you are getting flamed for no reason but my heart is telling me "fuck yasuo players"
I understand people hate the champ. But like i play him like once or twice a month... in a normal game. Like am i really cancer for that?
